CustomBehavior.Text: Unable to start Klaxxi Dailies: You must progress further in the storyline for Dread Wastes. Recommend downloading and using Kick's Dread Wastes profile. Press Continue to move on to next area.

CustomBehavior.Text:
WARNING: Previously completed quests detected! 

 Either you have done some of you quests already, and have restarted the bot...
 OR your cache folder is NOT clean, and must be deleted, and bot restarted.
Starting Klaxxi Dailies, moving to Klaxxi'Vess.
